summary: Provides a command‑line entry point that configures and launches training of a multi‑task encoder‑decoder speech‑to‑text model using NVIDIA NeMo, supporting configurable data manifests, bucketed batching, distributed training, optimizer settings, and experiment logging.
business_intent: Allow developers and researchers to train high‑performance automatic speech recognition (ASR) models with optional language model components on large audio datasets, leveraging GPU clusters and experiment tracking tools for rapid prototyping and production deployment.
